CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. The 'text' parameter is directly used to set the 'textContent' of 'statusElem' without any sanitization or encoding. An attacker can inject malicious scripts as 'text' which will be executed when the status is displayed.
